verses.verse: וַיְהִי֙ <S%H1961><s%> came בַּיָּמִ֣ים <S%H3117><s%> And it came to pass in those days הָהֵ֔ם <S%H1992><s%> those וּמֶ֖לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> when [there was] no king אֵ֣ין <S%H369><s%> there בְּיִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> in Israel וַיְהִ֣י ׀ <S%H1961><s%> came אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> that there was a certain לֵוִ֗י <S%H3881><s%> Levite גָּ֚ר <S%H1481><s%> sojourning בְּיַרְכְּתֵ֣י <S%H3411><s%> on the side הַר־ <S%H2022><s%> of mount אֶפְרַ֔יִם <S%H669><s%> Ephraim וַיִּֽקַּֽח־ <S%H3947><s%> who took לוֹ֙ אִשָּׁ֣ה <S%H802><s%> ess פִילֶ֔גֶשׁ <S%H6370><s%> A concubine מִבֵּ֥ית לֶ֖חֶם <S%H1035><s%> Bethlehem יְהוּדָֽה׃ <S%H3063><s%> Judah

וַתִּזְנֶ֤ה <S%H2181><s%> played the whore עָלָיו֙ <S%H5921><s%> against פִּֽילַגְשׁ֔וֹ <S%H6370><s%> And his concubine וַתֵּ֤לֶךְ <S%H1980><s%> went מֵֽאִתּוֹ֙ <S%H853><s%> אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> house אָבִ֔יהָ <S%H1><s%> from him unto her father's אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about בֵּ֥ית לֶ֖חֶם <S%H1035><s%> Bethlehem יְהוּדָ֑ה <S%H3063><s%> Judah וַתְּהִי־ <S%H1961><s%> become שָׁ֕ם <S%H8033><s%> was there יָמִ֖ים <S%H3117><s%> A period אַרְבָּעָ֥ה <S%H702><s%> and was there four חֳדָשִֽׁים׃ <S%H2320><s%> months

וַיָּ֨קָם <S%H6965><s%> arose אִישָׁ֜הּ <S%H376><s%> And her husband וַיֵּ֣לֶךְ <S%H1980><s%> and went אַחֲרֶ֗יהָ <S%H310><s%> after לְדַבֵּ֤ר <S%H1696><s%> her to speak עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and לִבָּהּ֙ <S%H3820><s%> friendly [לַהֲשִׁיבֹו כ] (לַהֲשִׁיבָ֔הּ <S%H7725><s%> break ק) וְנַעֲר֥וֹ <S%H5288><s%> having his servant עִמּ֖וֹ <S%H5973><s%> and a וְצֶ֣מֶד <S%H6776><s%> with him and a couple חֲמֹרִ֑ים <S%H2543><s%> of asses וַתְּבִיאֵ֙הוּ֙ <S%H935><s%> and she brought בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> house אָבִ֔יהָ <S%H1><s%> him into her father's וַיִּרְאֵ֙הוּ֙ <S%H7200><s%> saw אֲבִ֣י <S%H1><s%> and when the father הַֽנַּעֲרָ֔ה <S%H5291><s%> of the damsel וַיִּשְׂמַ֖ח <S%H8055><s%> him he rejoiced לִקְרָאתֽוֹ׃ <S%H7125><s%> to meet

וַיֶּחֱזַק־ <S%H2388><s%> retained בּ֤וֹ חֹֽתְנוֹ֙ <S%H2859><s%> And his father in law אֲבִ֣י <S%H1><s%> father הַֽנַּעֲרָ֔ה <S%H5291><s%> the damsel's וַיֵּ֥שֶׁב <S%H3427><s%> him and he abode אִתּ֖וֹ <S%H854><s%> for שְׁלֹ֣שֶׁת <S%H7969><s%> with him three יָמִ֑ים <S%H3117><s%> days וַיֹּאכְלוּ֙ <S%H398><s%> so they did eat וַיִּשְׁתּ֔וּ <S%H8354><s%> and drink וַיָּלִ֖ינוּ <S%H3885><s%> and lodged שָֽׁם׃ <S%H8033><s%> there

וַֽיְהִי֙ <S%H1961><s%> become בַּיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> day הָרְבִיעִ֔י <S%H7243><s%> And it came to pass on the fourth וַיַּשְׁכִּ֥ימוּ <S%H7925><s%> when they arose early בַבֹּ֖קֶר <S%H1242><s%> in the morning וַיָּ֣קָם <S%H6965><s%> that he rose up לָלֶ֑כֶת <S%H1980><s%> to go וַיֹּאמֶר֩ <S%H559><s%> said אֲבִ֨י <S%H1><s%> father הַֽנַּעֲרָ֜ה <S%H5291><s%> and the damsel's אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to his חֲתָנ֗וֹ <S%H2860><s%> unto his son in law סְעָ֧ד <S%H5582><s%> Comfort לִבְּךָ֛ <S%H3820><s%> thine heart פַּת־ <S%H6595><s%> with a morsel לֶ֖חֶם <S%H3899><s%> of bread וְאַחַ֥ר <S%H310><s%> and afterward תֵּלֵֽכוּ׃ <S%H1980><s%> may go

וַיֵּשְׁב֗וּ <S%H3427><s%> And they sat down וַיֹּאכְל֧וּ <S%H398><s%> and did eat שְׁנֵיהֶ֛ם <S%H8147><s%> both יַחְדָּ֖ו <S%H3162><s%> of them together וַיִּשְׁתּ֑וּ <S%H8354><s%> and drink וַיֹּ֜אמֶר <S%H559><s%> had said אֲבִ֤י <S%H1><s%> father הַֽנַּעֲרָה֙ <S%H5291><s%> for the damsel's אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הָאִ֔ישׁ <S%H376><s%> unto the man הֽוֹאֶל־ <S%H2974><s%> Be content נָ֥א <S%H4994><s%> Please וְלִ֖ין <S%H3885><s%> I pray thee and tarry all night וְיִטַ֥ב <S%H3190><s%> be merry לִבֶּֽךָ׃ <S%H3820><s%> and let thine heart

וַיָּ֥קָם <S%H6965><s%> rose up הָאִ֖ישׁ <S%H376><s%> And when the man לָלֶ֑כֶת <S%H1980><s%> to go וַיִּפְצַר־ <S%H6484><s%> urged בּוֹ֙ חֹתְנ֔וֹ <S%H2859><s%> his father in law וַיָּ֖שָׁב <S%H7725><s%> there again וַיָּ֥לֶן <S%H3885><s%> him therefore he lodged שָֽׁם׃ <S%H8033><s%> there

וַיַּשְׁכֵּ֨ם <S%H7925><s%> And he arose early בַּבֹּ֜קֶר <S%H1242><s%> in the morning בַּיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> day הַחֲמִישִׁי֮ <S%H2549><s%> on the fifth לָלֶכֶת֒ <S%H1980><s%> to go וַיֹּ֣אמֶר ׀ <S%H559><s%> said אֲבִ֣י <S%H1><s%> father הַֽנַּעֲרָ֗ה <S%H5291><s%> and the damsel's סְעָד־ <S%H5582><s%> Comfort נָא֙ <S%H4994><s%> Please לְבָ֣בְךָ֔ <S%H3824><s%> thine heart וְהִֽתְמַהְמְה֖וּ <S%H4102><s%> I pray thee And they tarried עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> until נְט֣וֹת <S%H5186><s%> afternoon הַיּ֑וֹם <S%H3117><s%> day וַיֹּאכְל֖וּ <S%H398><s%> and they did eat שְׁנֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H8147><s%> both

וַיָּ֤קָם <S%H6965><s%> rose up הָאִישׁ֙ <S%H376><s%> And when the man לָלֶ֔כֶת <S%H1980><s%> that thou mayest go ה֥וּא <S%H1931><s%> he וּפִילַגְשׁ֖וֹ <S%H6370><s%> he and his concubine וְנַעֲר֑וֹ <S%H5288><s%> and his servant וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said ל֣וֹ חֹתְנ֣וֹ <S%H2859><s%> his father in law אֲבִ֣י <S%H1><s%> father הַֽנַּעֲרָ֡ה <S%H5291><s%> the damsel's הִנֵּ֣ה <S%H2009><s%> Behold נָא֩ <S%H4994><s%> now רָפָ֨ה <S%H7503><s%> draweth הַיּ֜וֹם <S%H3117><s%> unto him Behold now the day לַעֲרֹ֗ב <S%H6150><s%> toward evening לִֽינוּ־ <S%H3885><s%> I pray you tarry all night נָ֞א <S%H4994><s%> please הִנֵּ֨ה <S%H2009><s%> Lo חֲנ֤וֹת <S%H2583><s%> groweth to an end הַיּוֹם֙ <S%H3117><s%> behold the day לִ֥ין <S%H3885><s%> lodge פֹּה֙ <S%H6311><s%> here וְיִיטַ֣ב <S%H3190><s%> may be merry לְבָבֶ֔ךָ <S%H3824><s%> here that thine heart וְהִשְׁכַּמְתֶּ֤ם <S%H7925><s%> get you early מָחָר֙ <S%H4279><s%> and to morrow לְדַרְכְּכֶ֔ם <S%H1870><s%> on your way וְהָלַכְתָּ֖ <S%H1980><s%> you may go לְאֹהָלֶֽךָ׃ <S%H168><s%> home

וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> was not אָבָ֤ה <S%H14><s%> would הָאִישׁ֙ <S%H376><s%> But the man לָל֔וּן <S%H3885><s%> not tarry that night וַיָּ֣קָם <S%H6965><s%> but he rose up וַיֵּ֗לֶךְ <S%H1980><s%> and departed וַיָּבֹא֙ <S%H935><s%> and came עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> to נֹ֣כַח <S%H5227><s%> over against יְב֔וּס <S%H2982><s%> Jebus הִ֖יא <S%H1931><s%> he יְרוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <S%H3389><s%> which [is] Jerusalem וְעִמּ֗וֹ <S%H5973><s%> with צֶ֤מֶד <S%H6776><s%> and [there were] with him two חֲמוֹרִים֙ <S%H2543><s%> asses חֲבוּשִׁ֔ים <S%H2280><s%> saddled וּפִילַגְשׁ֖וֹ <S%H6370><s%> his concubine עִמּֽוֹ׃ <S%H5973><s%> with

הֵ֣ם <S%H1992><s%> When עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> they near יְב֔וּס <S%H2982><s%> [And] when they [were] by Jebus וְהַיּ֖וֹם <S%H3117><s%> the day רַ֣ד <S%H7286><s%> spent מְאֹ֑ד <S%H3966><s%> was far וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said הַנַּ֜עַר <S%H5288><s%> and the servant אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to his אֲדֹנָ֗יו <S%H113><s%> unto his master לְכָה־ <S%H1980><s%> come נָּ֛א <S%H4994><s%> Please וְנָס֛וּרָה <S%H5493><s%> I pray thee and let us turn in אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about עִֽיר־ <S%H5892><s%> into this city הַיְבוּסִ֥י <S%H2983><s%> of the Jebusites הַזֹּ֖את <S%H2063><s%> likewise וְנָלִ֥ין <S%H3885><s%> and lodge בָּֽהּ׃

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said אֵלָיו֙ <S%H413><s%> about אֲדֹנָ֔יו <S%H113><s%> And his master לֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> We will not נָסוּר֙ <S%H5493><s%> unto him We will not turn aside אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> into עִ֣יר <S%H5892><s%> hither into the city נָכְרִ֔י <S%H5237><s%> of a stranger אֲשֶׁ֛ר <S%H834><s%> who לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> are not מִבְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> that [is] not of the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel הֵ֑נָּה <S%H2008><s%> here וְעָבַ֖רְנוּ <S%H5674><s%> we will pass over עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> far גִּבְעָֽה׃ <S%H1390><s%> to Gibeah

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> And he said לְנַעֲר֔וֹ <S%H5288><s%> unto his servant לְךָ֥ <S%H1980><s%> Come וְנִקְרְבָ֖ה <S%H7126><s%> and let us draw near בְּאַחַ֣ד <S%H259><s%> to one הַמְּקֹמ֑וֹת <S%H4725><s%> of these places וְלַ֥נּוּ <S%H3885><s%> to lodge all night בַגִּבְעָ֖ה <S%H1390><s%> in Gibeah א֥וֹ <S%H176><s%> or בָרָמָֽה׃ <S%H7414><s%> or in Ramah

וַיַּעַבְר֖וּ <S%H5674><s%> And they passed on וַיֵּלֵ֑כוּ <S%H1980><s%> and went וַתָּבֹ֤א <S%H935><s%> went down לָהֶם֙ הַשֶּׁ֔מֶשׁ <S%H8121><s%> and the sun אֵ֥צֶל <S%H681><s%> upon them [when they were] by הַגִּבְעָ֖ה <S%H1390><s%> Gibeah אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which לְבִנְיָמִֽן׃ <S%H1144><s%> which [belongeth] to Benjamin

וַיָּסֻ֣רוּ <S%H5493><s%> And they turned aside שָׁ֔ם <S%H8033><s%> there לָב֖וֹא <S%H935><s%> thither to go in לָל֣וּן <S%H3885><s%> [and] to lodge בַּגִּבְעָ֑ה <S%H1390><s%> in Gibeah וַיָּבֹ֗א <S%H935><s%> and when he went in וַיֵּ֙שֶׁב֙ <S%H3427><s%> he sat him down בִּרְח֣וֹב <S%H7339><s%> in a street הָעִ֔יר <S%H5892><s%> of the city וְאֵ֥ין <S%H369><s%> no אִ֛ישׁ <S%H376><s%> for [there was] no man מְאַסֵּֽף־ <S%H622><s%> that took אוֹתָ֥ם <S%H853><s%> הַבַּ֖יְתָה <S%H1004><s%> them into his house לָלֽוּן׃ <S%H3885><s%> to lodging

וְהִנֵּ֣ה ׀ <S%H2009><s%> behold אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> man זָקֵ֗ן <S%H2205><s%> an old בָּ֣א <S%H935><s%> And behold there came מִֽן־ <S%H4480><s%> from מַעֲשֵׂ֤הוּ <S%H4639><s%> from his work מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> out הַשָּׂדֶה֙ <S%H7704><s%> out of the field בָּעֶ֔רֶב <S%H6153><s%> at even וְהָאִישׁ֙ <S%H376><s%> which [was] also מֵהַ֣ר <S%H2022><s%> of mount אֶפְרַ֔יִם <S%H669><s%> Ephraim וְהוּא־ <S%H1931><s%> and he גָ֖ר <S%H1481><s%> and he sojourned בַּגִּבְעָ֑ה <S%H1390><s%> in Gibeah וְאַנְשֵׁ֥י <S%H376><s%> the men הַמָּק֖וֹם <S%H4725><s%> of the place בְּנֵ֥י יְמִינִֽי׃ <S%H1145><s%> [were] Benjamites

וַיִּשָּׂ֣א <S%H5375><s%> And when he had lifted up עֵינָ֗יו <S%H5869><s%> his eyes וַיַּ֛רְא <S%H7200><s%> he saw אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָאִ֥ישׁ <S%H376><s%> man הָאֹרֵ֖חַ <S%H732><s%> a wayfaring בִּרְחֹ֣ב <S%H7339><s%> in the street הָעִ֑יר <S%H5892><s%> of the city וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said הָאִ֧ישׁ <S%H376><s%> man הַזָּקֵ֛ן <S%H2205><s%> and the old אָ֥נָה <S%H575><s%> Where תֵלֵ֖ךְ <S%H1980><s%> going וּמֵאַ֥יִן <S%H370><s%> thou? and whence תָּבֽוֹא׃ <S%H935><s%> comest

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> And he said אֵלָ֗יו <S%H413><s%> to him עֹבְרִ֨ים <S%H5674><s%> unto him We [are] passing אֲנַ֜חְנוּ <S%H587><s%> ourselves מִבֵּֽית־ לֶ֣חֶם <S%H1035><s%> Bethlehem יְהוּדָה֮ <S%H3063><s%> Judah עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> against יַרְכְּתֵ֣י <S%H3411><s%> toward the side הַר־ <S%H2022><s%> of mount אֶפְרַיִם֒ <S%H669><s%> Ephraim מִשָּׁ֣ם <S%H8033><s%> there אָנֹ֔כִי <S%H595><s%> and I וָאֵלֵ֕ךְ <S%H1980><s%> but I [am now] going עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> against בֵּ֥ית לֶ֖חֶם <S%H1035><s%> to Bethlehem יְהוּדָ֑ה <S%H3063><s%> Judah וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בֵּ֤ית <S%H1004><s%> to the house יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֲנִ֣י <S%H589><s%> I הֹלֵ֔ךְ <S%H1980><s%> going וְאֵ֣ין <S%H369><s%> and no אִ֔ישׁ <S%H376><s%> and there [is] no man מְאַסֵּ֥ף <S%H622><s%> that receiveth אוֹתִ֖י <S%H853><s%> הַבָּֽיְתָה׃ <S%H1004><s%> me to house

וְגַם־ <S%H1571><s%> is both תֶּ֤בֶן <S%H8401><s%> both straw גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> and also מִסְפּוֹא֙ <S%H4554><s%> and provender יֵ֣שׁ <S%H3426><s%> Yet there is לַחֲמוֹרֵ֔ינוּ <S%H2543><s%> for our asses וְ֠גַם <S%H1571><s%> is both לֶ֣חֶם <S%H3899><s%> and there is bread וָיַ֤יִן <S%H3196><s%> and wine יֶשׁ־ <S%H3426><s%> there לִי֙ וְלַֽאֲמָתֶ֔ךָ <S%H519><s%> also for me and for thy handmaid וְלַנַּ֖עַר <S%H5288><s%> and for the young man עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> is with עֲבָדֶ֑יךָ <S%H5650><s%> [which is] with thy servants אֵ֥ין <S%H369><s%> there מַחְס֖וֹר <S%H4270><s%> [there is] no want כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> of any דָּבָֽר׃ <S%H1697><s%> of any thing

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said הָאִ֤ישׁ <S%H376><s%> man הַזָּקֵן֙ <S%H2205><s%> And the old שָׁל֣וֹם <S%H7965><s%> Peace לָ֔ךְ רַ֥ק <S%H7535><s%> [be] with thee howsoever כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all מַחְסוֹרְךָ֖ <S%H4270><s%> [let] all thy wants עָלָ֑י <S%H5921><s%> and רַ֥ק <S%H7535><s%> in בָּרְח֖וֹב <S%H7339><s%> not in the street אַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תָּלַֽן׃ <S%H3885><s%> [lie] upon me only lodge

וַיְבִיאֵ֣הוּ <S%H935><s%> So he brought לְבֵית֔וֹ <S%H1004><s%> him into his house [וַיִּבֹּול כ] (וַיָּ֖בָל <S%H1101><s%> anoint ק) לַחֲמוֹרִ֑ים <S%H2543><s%> unto the asses וַֽיִּרְחֲצוּ֙ <S%H7364><s%> and they washed רַגְלֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H7272><s%> their feet וַיֹּאכְל֖וּ <S%H398><s%> and did eat וַיִּשְׁתּֽוּ׃ <S%H8354><s%> and drink

הֵמָּה֮ <S%H1992><s%> like מֵיטִיבִ֣ים <S%H3190><s%> merry אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> לִבָּם֒ <S%H3820><s%> [Now] as they were making their hearts וְהִנֵּה֩ <S%H2009><s%> behold אַנְשֵׁ֨י <S%H376><s%> man הָעִ֜יר <S%H5892><s%> of the city אַנְשֵׁ֣י <S%H376><s%> the man בְנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> sons בְלִיַּ֗עַל <S%H1100><s%> of Belial נָסַ֙בּוּ֙ <S%H5437><s%> round about אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַבַּ֔יִת <S%H1004><s%> the house מִֽתְדַּפְּקִ֖ים <S%H1849><s%> [and] beat עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and הַדָּ֑לֶת <S%H1817><s%> at the door וַיֹּאמְר֗וּ <S%H559><s%> and spake אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about הָ֠אִישׁ <S%H376><s%> man בַּ֣עַל <S%H1167><s%> to the master הַבַּ֤יִת <S%H1004><s%> of the house הַזָּקֵן֙ <S%H2205><s%> the old לֵאמֹ֔ר <S%H559><s%> saying הוֹצֵ֗א <S%H3318><s%> Bring forth אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָאִ֛ישׁ <S%H376><s%> the man אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> who בָּ֥א <S%H935><s%> that came אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> into בֵּיתְךָ֖ <S%H1004><s%> into thine house וְנֵדָעֶֽנּוּ׃ <S%H3045><s%> that we may know

וַיֵּצֵ֣א <S%H3318><s%> went out אֲלֵיהֶ֗ם <S%H413><s%> then הָאִישׁ֙ <S%H376><s%> And the man בַּ֣עַל <S%H1167><s%> the master הַבַּ֔יִת <S%H1004><s%> of the house וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> unto them and said אֲלֵהֶ֔ם <S%H413><s%> to אַל־ <S%H408><s%> unto them Nay אַחַ֖י <S%H251><s%> my brethren אַל־ <S%H408><s%> No תָּרֵ֣עוּ <S%H7489><s%> [nay] I pray you do not [so] wickedly נָ֑א <S%H4994><s%> please אַ֠חֲרֵי <S%H310><s%> seeing אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> after בָּ֞א <S%H935><s%> is come הָאִ֤ישׁ <S%H376><s%> that this man הַזֶּה֙ <S%H2088><s%> this אַל־ <S%H413><s%> into בֵּיתִ֔י <S%H1004><s%> into mine house אַֽל־ <S%H408><s%> No תַּעֲשׂ֖וּ <S%H6213><s%> do אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַנְּבָלָ֥ה <S%H5039><s%> not this folly הַזֹּֽאת׃ <S%H2063><s%> likewise

הִנֵּה֩ <S%H2009><s%> Here בִתִּ֨י <S%H1323><s%> Behold [here is] my daughter הַבְּתוּלָ֜ה <S%H1330><s%> a maiden וּפִֽילַגְשֵׁ֗הוּ <S%H6370><s%> and his concubine אוֹצִֽיאָה־ <S%H3318><s%> them I will bring out נָּ֤א <S%H4994><s%> Please אוֹתָם֙ <S%H853><s%> וְעַנּ֣וּ <S%H6031><s%> now and humble אוֹתָ֔ם <S%H853><s%> וַעֲשׂ֣וּ <S%H6213><s%> ye them and do לָהֶ֔ם הַטּ֖וֹב <S%H2896><s%> good בְּעֵינֵיכֶ֑ם <S%H5869><s%> with them what seemeth וְלָאִ֤ישׁ <S%H376><s%> unto you but unto this man הַזֶּה֙ <S%H2088><s%> such לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> not תַעֲשׂ֔וּ <S%H6213><s%> do דְּבַ֖ר <S%H1697><s%> a thing הַנְּבָלָ֥ה <S%H5039><s%> vile הַזֹּֽאת׃ <S%H2063><s%> not so

וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> not אָב֤וּ <S%H14><s%> would הָאֲנָשִׁים֙ <S%H582><s%> But the men לִשְׁמֹ֣עַֽ <S%H8085><s%> not hearken ל֔וֹ וַיַּחֲזֵ֤ק <S%H2388><s%> took הָאִישׁ֙ <S%H376><s%> to him so the man בְּפִ֣ילַגְשׁ֔וֹ <S%H6370><s%> his concubine וַיֹּצֵ֥א <S%H3318><s%> and brought אֲלֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H413><s%> about הַח֑וּץ <S%H2351><s%> her forth וַיֵּדְע֣וּ <S%H3045><s%> unto them and they knew א֠וֹתָהּ <S%H853><s%> וַיִּֽתְעַלְּלוּ־ <S%H5953><s%> her and abused בָ֤הּ כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> her all הַלַּ֙יְלָה֙ <S%H3915><s%> her all the night עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> until הַבֹּ֔קֶר <S%H1242><s%> until the morning וַֽיְשַׁלְּח֖וּהָ <S%H7971><s%> they let her go [בַּעֲלֹות כ] (כַּעֲלֹ֥ות <S%H5927><s%> arise ק) הַשָּֽׁחַר׃ <S%H7837><s%> and when the day

וַתָּבֹ֥א <S%H935><s%> Then came הָאִשָּׁ֖ה <S%H802><s%> the woman לִפְנ֣וֹת <S%H6437><s%> in the dawning הַבֹּ֑קֶר <S%H1242><s%> of the day וַתִּפֹּ֞ל <S%H5307><s%> and fell down פֶּ֧תַח <S%H6607><s%> at the door בֵּית־ <S%H1004><s%> house הָאִ֛ישׁ <S%H376><s%> of the man's אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> after אֲדוֹנֶ֥יהָ <S%H113><s%> where her lord שָּׁ֖ם <S%H8033><s%> in it עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> was until הָאֽוֹר׃ <S%H216><s%> [was] till it was light

וַיָּ֨קָם <S%H6965><s%> rose up אֲדֹנֶ֜יהָ <S%H113><s%> And her lord בַּבֹּ֗קֶר <S%H1242><s%> in the morning וַיִּפְתַּח֙ <S%H6605><s%> and opened דַּלְת֣וֹת <S%H1817><s%> the doors הַבַּ֔יִת <S%H1004><s%> of the house וַיֵּצֵ֖א <S%H3318><s%> and went out לָלֶ֣כֶת <S%H1980><s%> to go לְדַרְכּ֑וֹ <S%H1870><s%> his way וְהִנֵּ֧ה <S%H2009><s%> behold הָאִשָּׁ֣ה <S%H802><s%> and behold the woman פִֽילַגְשׁ֗וֹ <S%H6370><s%> his concubine נֹפֶ֙לֶת֙ <S%H5307><s%> was fallen down פֶּ֣תַח <S%H6607><s%> [at] the door הַבַּ֔יִת <S%H1004><s%> of the house וְיָדֶ֖יהָ <S%H3027><s%> and her hands עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on הַסַּֽף׃ <S%H5592><s%> [were] upon the threshold

וַיֹּ֧אמֶר <S%H559><s%> And he said אֵלֶ֛יהָ <S%H413><s%> to her ק֥וּמִי <S%H6965><s%> unto her Up וְנֵלֵ֖כָה <S%H1980><s%> go וְאֵ֣ין <S%H369><s%> there עֹנֶ֑ה <S%H6030><s%> But none answered וַיִּקָּחֶ֙הָ֙ <S%H3947><s%> took עַֽל־ <S%H5921><s%> her on הַחֲמ֔וֹר <S%H2543><s%> her [up] upon an ass וַיָּ֣קָם <S%H6965><s%> rose up הָאִ֔ישׁ <S%H376><s%> Then the man וַיֵּ֖לֶךְ <S%H1980><s%> and went לִמְקֹמֽוֹ׃ <S%H4725><s%> him unto his place

וַיָּבֹ֣א <S%H935><s%> And when he was come אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about בֵּית֗וֹ <S%H1004><s%> into his house וַיִּקַּ֤ח <S%H3947><s%> he took אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַֽמַּאֲכֶ֙לֶת֙ <S%H3979><s%> a knife וַיַּחֲזֵ֣ק <S%H2388><s%> and laid hold בְּפִֽילַגְשׁ֔וֹ <S%H6370><s%> on his concubine וַֽיְנַתְּחֶ֙הָ֙ <S%H5408><s%> and divided לַעֲצָמֶ֔יהָ <S%H6106><s%> her [together] with her bones לִשְׁנֵ֥ים <S%H8147><s%> both עָשָׂ֖ר <S%H6240><s%> ten נְתָחִ֑ים <S%H5409><s%> pieces וַֽיְשַׁלְּחֶ֔הָ <S%H7971><s%> and sent בְּכֹ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> her throughout גְּב֥וּל <S%H1366><s%> her into all the coasts יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel

וְהָיָ֣ה <S%H1961><s%> And it was so כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> All הָרֹאֶ֗ה <S%H7200><s%> that all that saw וְאָמַר֙ <S%H559><s%> it said לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> Nothing נִהְיְתָ֤ה <S%H1961><s%> has happened וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> Nothing נִרְאֲתָה֙ <S%H7200><s%> done nor seen כָּזֹ֔את <S%H2063><s%> There was no such deed לְמִיּ֞וֹם <S%H3117><s%> from the day עֲל֤וֹת <S%H5927><s%> came up בְּנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> that the children יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel מֵאֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> out of the land מִצְרַ֔יִם <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt עַ֖ד <S%H5704><s%> against הַיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> unto this day הַזֶּ֑ה <S%H2088><s%> this שִֽׂימוּ־ <S%H7760><s%> consider לָכֶ֥ם עָלֶ֖יהָ <S%H5921><s%> and עֻ֥צוּ <S%H5779><s%> of it take advice וְדַבֵּֽרוּ׃ <S%H1696><s%> and speak פ
